text: Sphenodesme involucrata is a species of small liana in the genus Sphenodesme (family Lamiaceae). It is found in: India, Assam, Andaman & Nicobar Islands, Myanmar, Vietnam, Thailand, Malaya, Borneo, Guangdong, Hainan, Taiwan and central Vietnam: where it may be called bội tinh tong bao. ==Gallery== Sphenodesme paniculata 11.JPG Sphenodesme paniculata 13.JPG Sphenodesme paniculata- at Iritty 2014 (10).jpg ==References== Phạm Hoàng Hộ (2003) Cây Cỏ Việt Nam: an Illustrated Flora of Vietnam vol. II publ. Nhà Xuẩt Bản Trẻ, HCMC, VN. ==External Links== * * Note: Sphenodesme paniculata C.B.Clarke is a synonym of Sphenodesme involucrata var. paniculata (C.B.Clarke) Munir Category:Lamiaceae Category:Flora of Indo-China Category:Flora of Malesia
title: Sphenodesme involucrata
